law.text: Any person subject to this code who, without proper authority, releases any prisoner committed to his or her charge, or who through neglect or design suffers any such prisoner to escape, shall be punished as a court-martial may direct, whether or not the prisoner was committed in strict compliance with law.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 100, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 73.
